reviewText: I was looking for DVD but got a VHS tape.  Not sure if I have a VHS player in the attic.
While the story was a little slow it was nice to see the wonders of the Amazon rain forest and to be reminded of what it holds for our future. Low budget, but worth every penny.

The movie was actually shot in Brazil. I think this is a straight-to-video release. Looks like it was shot on a shoestring budget but the scenery looks great. The movie really picks up when the unbelievably gorgeous Rae Dawn Chong appears. She doesn't appear until 50 minutes into the movie. If you are a fan of Rae's you will love this movie. She has a deep dark skin tan in this movie.
AMAZON is an awesome movie. There is a bit of language but not much so this is an excellent movie!
